Thu Dec 28 03:01:35 PM UTC 2023
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/bin
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/npth-1.6/bin/npth-config /opt/bin//npth-config
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/include
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/npth-1.6/include/npth.h /opt/include//npth.h
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/lib
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/npth-1.6/lib/libnpth.la /opt/lib//libnpth.la
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/npth-1.6/lib/libnpth.so.0.1.2 /opt/lib//libnpth.so.0.1.2
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/npth-1.6/lib/libnpth.so /opt/lib//libnpth.so
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/npth-1.6/lib/libnpth.so.0 /opt/lib//libnpth.so.0
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/share
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/share//aclocal
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/npth-1.6/share/aclocal/npth.m4 /opt/share//aclocal/npth.m4
